forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High around 65F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with some clearing expected late. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers developing during the afternoon with the possibility of a thunderstorm. High near 15C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with showers likely in the afternoon. Thunder is possible. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the evening, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the evening, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Low clouds and fog. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Low clouds and fog. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
